content:
Sure, here are ten example headlines for performance max campaigns that use the keyword "Mushroom decor" and are under 90 characters:

1. "Add a touch of whimsy with our mushroom-inspired decor"
2. "Get your home looking fun-gi with our mushroom decor"
3. "Elevate your interior design with mushroom decor"
4. "Bring the outdoors in with our mushroom-themed decor"
5. "Mushroom decor for the modern home"
6. "Make a statement with our unique mushroom decor"
7. "Mushrooms are the new black: Shop our decor collection"
8. "Fungi-fy your home with our mushroom decor"
9. "Decorate your space with the beauty of mushrooms"
10. "Fall in love with our selection of mushroom decor"

It's worth noting that, like before, your headlines should align with your ad targeting, landing page and overall message, to create a cohesive message throughout the customer journey. Additionally, testing different headlines can help you to determine which one performs better and resonates with your target audience.
